questions.text: What product did you smoke?
questions.smsText: What product did you smoke? (1=Cigarette,2=Little cigar,3=Cigarillo,4=Large cigar)

questions.text: Use your camera to take a picture of the product or packaging of the product that you just smoked.
questions.smsText: Use your camera to take a picture of the product or packaging of the product that you just smoked.

questions.text: Was it a menthol cigarette?
questions.smsText: Was it a menthol cigarette? (1=Yes,2=No)

questions.text: Was it flavored?
questions.smsText: Was it flavored? (1=Yes,2=No)

questions.text: What flavor was it?
questions.smsText: What flavor was it? (1=Mint or menthol,2=Wine,3=Fruit,4=Chocolate, vanilla, or honey,5=Strawberry daiquiri,6=Mojito,7=Rum,8=Some other flavor,9=Don't know)

questions.text: Were you with others when you were smoking?
questions.smsText: Were you with others when you were smoking?  (1=Yes,2=No)

questions.text: Where they also smoking?
questions.smsText: Where they also smoking? (1=Yes,2=No)

questions.text: Where they also smoking a cigarette?
questions.smsText: Where they also smoking a cigarette? (1=Yes,2=No)

questions.text: Where they also smoking a little cigar?
questions.smsText: Where they also smoking a little cigar? (1=Yes,2=No)

questions.text: Where they also smoking a cigarillo?
questions.smsText: Where they also smoking a cigarillo? (1=Yes,2=No)

questions.text: Where they also smoking a large cigar?
questions.smsText: Where they also smoking a large cigar? (1=Yes,2=No)

questions.text: Did you put marijuana in your cigarette?
questions.smsText: Did you put marijuana in your cigarette? (1=Yes,2=No)

questions.text: Did you put marijuana in your little cigar?
questions.smsText: Did you put marijuana in your little cigar? (1=Yes,2=No)

questions.text: Did you put marijuana in your cigarillo?
questions.smsText: Did you put marijuana in your cigarillo? (1=Yes,2=No)

questions.text: Did you put marijuana in your large cigar?
questions.smsText: Did you put marijuana in your large cigar? (1=Yes,2=No)

questions.text: On a scale of 1 (not at all) to 10 (extremely), rate how strongly you wanted to smoke that cigarette in the 15 minutes before you smoked it.
questions.smsText: On a scale of 1 (not at all) to 10 (extremely), rate how strongly you wanted to smoke that cigarette in the 15 minutes before you smoked it. (1=Not at all 10=Extremely)

questions.text: On a scale of 1 (not at all) to 10 (extremely), rate how strongly you wanted to smoke that little cigar in the 15 minutes before you smoked it.
questions.smsText: On a scale of 1 (not at all) to 10 (extremely), rate how strongly you wanted to smoke that little cigar in the 15 minutes before you smoked it. (1=Not at all 10=Extremely)

questions.text: On a scale of 1 (not at all) to 10 (extremely), rate how strongly you wanted to smoke that cigarillo in the 15 minutes before you smoked it.
questions.smsText: On a scale of 1 (not at all) to 10 (extremely), rate how strongly you wanted to smoke that cigarillo in the 15 minutes before you smoked it. (1=Not at all 10=Extremely)

questions.text: On a scale of 1 (not at all) to 10 (extremely), rate how strongly you wanted to smoke that large cigar in the 15 minutes before you smoked it.
questions.smsText: On a scale of 1 (not at all) to 10 (extremely), rate how strongly you wanted to smoke that large cigar in the 15 minutes before you smoked it. (1=Not at all 10=Extremely)

questions.text: On a scale of 1 (not at all) to 10 (extremely), rate how satisfying that cigarette was that you recently smoked
questions.smsText: On a scale of 1 (not at all) to 10 (extremely), rate how satisfying that cigarette was that you recently smoked (1=Not at all 10=Extremely)

questions.smsText: On a scale of 1 (not at all) to 10 (extremely), rate how satisfying that little cigar was that you recently smoked (1=Not at all 10=Extremely)

questions.smsText: On a scale of 1 (not at all) to 10 (extremely), rate how satisfying that cigarillo was that you recently smoked (1=Not at all 10=Extremely)

questions.text: Would you have preferred to smoke a little cigar/cigarillo/large cigar instead of a cigarette?
questions.smsText: Would you have preferred to smoke a little cigar/cigarillo/large cigar instead of a cigarette? (1=Yes,2=No)

questions.text: Would you have preferred to smoke a cigarette instead of a little cigar/cigarillo/large cigar?
questions.smsText: Would you have preferred to smoke a cigarette instead of a little cigar/cigarillo/large cigar? (1=Yes,2=No)
